messages.subject: Re: mother's day
messages.msgSnippet: **..wondering what would be a perfect mother s day thing for me and I thought: I would like to magically have my toddlers back for one day.** Oh, yeah. My
messages.messageBody:
**..wondering what would be a perfect mother's day thing for me and I thought:

I would like to magically have my toddlers back for one day.**

Oh, yeah. My babies, Pat and Sarah, had their tenth birthday today! Their
older sister made them extra special HUGE (14" x 22") cards, with pictures
inside she's taken of them from the time they were infants to now. Mondo
cuteness. <g> I really like these people but man I sometimes really miss
those itty bitty ones that used to live here.

It just all goes so fast. Well, except for those first few months which went
on and on and on and on.... <g>

Deborah in IL
